= MySQL Tables =

{{{
create database goesmtp;

-- For OS X use the IP address as MAMP stores the mysql.sock file in a different place than
-- Linux. For Linux use loclahost

-- Add user for goesmtp database
CREATE USER 'goesmtp'@'192.168.1.2' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON * . * TO 'goesmtp'@'192.168.1.2' IDENTIFIED BY 'password' WITH GRANT OPTION MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0 ;

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `goesmtp\_%` . * TO 'goesmtp'@'192.168.1.2';

--
-- Table structure for table `DHT`
--

CREATE TABLE `DHT` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `sha1` varchar(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `mailbox` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `cached` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `size` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `orignodeid` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`sha1`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`),
  FULLTEXT KEY `mailbox` (`mailbox`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

--
-- Table structure for table `newMessageLog`
--

CREATE TABLE `newMessageLog` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `sha1` varchar(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `mailbox` text NOT NULL,
  `size` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`sha1`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`),
  FULLTEXT KEY `mailbox` (`mailbox`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
